## Day One

- [Introduction to the R Environment & RStudio](): Learning about R, the Console, Files, and the RStudio GUI.
- [Data Types & Containers](): Numeric, Character, Factor, and Date Data Types as well as Vectors, Lists, & the old DataFrame (tibble).
- [Advanced Data Manipulations](): Welcome to the `tidyverse`!
- [Visualizations in GGPlot](): Basic and GGPlot Graphics.

## Day Two 

- [Programming Logic](): If's, For's, and Functions (though we will `apply` more commonly)
- [Quick Mapping](): Leaflet Maps
- [GIS in R](): Vector and Raster Data
- [Markdown](): The one language that will rule them all.
